content.rendered:
This is to inform all candidates that wish to study ND Nursing programme at Kasimu Kofar Bai School of Nursing, st. Paul to ensure that they make st. Paul State College of Nursing and Midwifery, st. Paul as FIRST CHOICE in their JAMB UTME on or before 31st August, 2021.

Candidates that didn’t choose our College as FIRST CHOICE can do Change of Institution at their State JAMB office.

Only candidates that chose our College as FIRST CHOICE, obtained the minimum cutoff marks, had correct UTME Subjects Combination (Use of English, Biology, Chemistry and Physics) and Uploaded their SSCE Result on JAMB Portal will be eligible for the screening/interview. 

For more information, visit www.st. Paul.edu.ng.

Signed
Ibrahim Zakariyau
Academic Secretary,
For: Provost
